title: Essen new champion user created
body:
Essen; the star being

Role
Primary: mage
Secondary: assassin

Essen is a mele mage who relies on getting into range to unleash his devastating ult.

Passive : astral power
Essen's basic attacks scales with 0.7 AP

Q : star strike
sends out a skill shot that damages the first enemy hit dealing x damage plus (0.6 AP) and applying starlight for 5 seconds. starlight slows by 10%and does not count as a debuff.

W : cosmic blessing
Passive: grants a slowly growing shield when out of combat for 10 sec (200 + 0.2AP).
active: sends out a cone consuming shield dealing X (depending on the size of shield) damage and slows all units effected by 20% the active won't work unless you have the shield.

E : star empower
Essen empowers hid next basic attack dealing bonus magic damage (X + 0.7AP) if they are affected by starlight it stuns them.

R : spirit burst
essen channels for 2 seconds then dashes to target suppressing them and increasing damage for 5 seconds.

leave comments for ideas and tell RIOT.
